        public void rotate(char axis,
                   float radians)
        Rotates this square around either the x y or z axis, by an amount in radians
        Parameters:
        axis, - the axis you are rotating around, may be 'X', 'Y', or 'Z'
        radians, - the degree in radians you want to rotate around it
